movies.name: Power
movies.synopsis: James "Ghost" St. Patrick, a wealthy New York night club owner who has it all, catering for the city's elite and dreaming big, lives a double life as a drug kingpin.

movies.name: Vikings
movies.synopsis: The world of the Vikings is brought to life through the journey of Ragnar Lothbrok, the first Viking to emerge from Norse legend and onto the pages of history - a man on the edge of myth.

movies.name: Game of Thrones
movies.synopsis: While a civil war brews between several noble families in Westeros, the children of the former rulers of the land attempt to rise up to power. Meanwhile a forgotten race, bent on destruction, plans to return after thousands of years in the North.

movies.name: Interstellar
movies.synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.name: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.synopsis: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movies.name: The Avengers
movies.synopsis: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

movies.name: I Am Legend
movies.synopsis: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

movies.name: Avatar
movies.synopsis: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
